# TestParallelizationAttribute.DegreeOfParallelism property

1. If the degreeOfParallelism is not specified, the number of tasks is assumed to match Environment.ProcessorCount. 2. If the degreeOfParallelism is set to 0, the xUnit default settings are applied. 3. Otherwise, the specified value is used as the limiter.

```csharp
public int? DegreeOfParallelism { get; }
```
